Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Kedzie-Homan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Kedzie-Homan. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Monroe. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Monroe.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
